posts.title: 认识python及在工作中初步应用
posts.text: 连接天擎结果的可视化–统计图123456matplotlibimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltimport numpy as npx = np.arange(0,12.1,0.1)y = np.sin(x)plt.plot(x,y) 线的设置颜色和线型的设置1plt.plot(x, y, 'xx')plt.plot(x,y,'r')#plt.plot(x,y,'r--')#plt.plot(x,y,'r:')#plt.plot(x,y,'r-.')​plt.scatter(x,y) 字的设置1234plt.plot(x,y,color='lime', linestyle='', linewidth=4,\marker='^', markerfacecolor='black', markeredgecolor='r',\markersize=5,markeredgewidth=1,label='Normal',zorder=2) #o,^,v)#plt.scatter(x,y)ax1 = plt.gca()ax1.set_title('My title', fontname='Arial', fontsize=20,\weight='bold', style='italic')ax1.set_xlabel('time (UTC)')ax1.set_ylabel('T($^o$C)')​ # 设置刻度的位置ax1.set_xticks([0,2.5,7,11])ax1.set_xticklabels(['J','A','N','E'])ax1.tick_params(axis='both',direction='in', color='blue', length=10, width=2)​plt.plot(x+2,y, linewidth=4,label='Strange',zorder=1)​_ = plt.legend(loc='best') # lower left 子图的绘制123456789fig, ax = plt.subplots(2, 1)ax[1].plot(x, y)ax[0].plot(x+2, y,color='r') # 设定坐标轴的范围,对齐ax[1].set_xlim([0,15])ax[0].set_xlim([0,15])​fig = plt.figure(figsize = (8,4)) #画布大小为8*4​x2 = np.arange(1,100,1)y2 = np.exp(x2)plt.plot(x2,y2)​# 设置指数坐标轴ax = plt.gca()ax.set_yscale('log')​# 双坐标轴ax2 = ax.twinx()#ax2.plot(x,y,'ro')​ax3 = ax2.twiny()ax3.plot(x,y,'ro')#防止图片部分缺失，采用紧致总局#plt.tight_layout()# 保存pngplt.savefig('./myplt.png', dpi=300) 结果的可视化–分布图1234567891011import osimport numpy as npimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltar = np.recfromcsv('20180101.csv')print(ar[2])ar2 = np.array([list(a) for a in ar], np.float)ar2.shapear2[:,4]lat = ar2[:,1]lon = ar2[:,2]t = ar2[:,4]/10 python制图12345678910111213141516from matplotlib.colors import ListedColormap, BoundaryNormcmap = ListedColormap(['b', 'r'])# BoundaryNorm 会根据cmap把不同的区间映射到对应的颜色norm = BoundaryNorm([-40, 0, 40], cmap.N)# 利用normlize来标准化颜色的值#cmap = plt.get_cmap('Spectral')#norm = plt.Normalize(vmin=-40, vmax=40)fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,8))# c代表颜色的值,cmap是色带ax.scatter(lon, lat, s=30, c=t, cmap=cmap, marker='o', edgecolors = 'w', alpha = 1, norm=norm)ax.set_xlabel('lon', fontsize=15)ax.set_ylabel('lat', fontsize=15)ax.set_title('T($^o$C)')ax.grid(True)fig.tight_layout()plt.show()
